description: Helicopters deliver 50 tonnes of snow as mild weather impacts ski resorts in the Pyrenees.
title: French ski resort uses helicopters to deliver snow for bare slopes
title_page: French ski resort uses helicopters to deliver snow for bare slopes - BBC News
maintext: "We're not going to cover the entire ski station in snow, but without it we would have had to close a huge part of the ski domain, and it's during the holidays that we have the most activity for beginners and the ski schools," Mr Pounau said.
